signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a centralized platform for managing emails and chat support, leading to disorganization and missed communications.
signals.context: Currently using a shared Gmail account for handling emails across three regions with a team of five people.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is facing workflow friction due to the cluttered email management system, which is causing inefficiencies.
signals.context: Team members log into the same Gmail account to pick emails, leading to confusion and missed tasks.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a solution that can integrate multiple communication channels (email, chat, WhatsApp) into one platform.
signals.context: Looking for a unified way to handle support inquiries across different channels.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires AI capabilities to automate responses based on customer queries to improve response times across different time zones.
signals.suggested_solution: AI responses for email and chat support.
signals.context: The customer operates in multiple time zones and wants to ensure timely responses.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a way to set and monitor SLA breaches for their support emails.
signals.context: Wants to ensure timely responses and track performance against SLAs.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs the ability to export analytics and reports on email performance and customer inquiries.
signals.context: Wants to analyze response times and customer questions to improve service.
